node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，沒有病徵，與第 #1445 及 #2278 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history and has no symptoms. Her case is epidemiologically related to the cases of patients #1445 and #2278.
